description: Latin pinax, from Ancient Greek πίναξ (pínax, “tablet”).

entries.meaning: (by extension) A list or scheme inscribed on a tablet.
examples: Many of the lupus piscis I have seen, and have bin informed by the king's fishmonger they are taken on our coast, but was not satisfied for some reasons of his relation soe as to enter it into my Pinax  […]
